welcome_message_body: Welcome to Zhangjiajie, known for its breathtaking natural landscapes and the inspiration for the movie Avatar. We hope you enjoy exploring the city's unique beauty and charm during your visit.

restaurants.name: E-pino (一品乐)
restaurants.description: E-pino (一品乐) is a café located in 永定区.
restaurants.address: 永定区新汽车站威利斯水世界一楼, 永定区, 湖南

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New London Railway Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New London Railway Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport. No password required.
